    create(ExagonEntity entity)
    Create EventEnvelope with createEntityEvent

    - creates CreateEntityEvent to store as event
    - setCreationDate(iExagonContext.getTsWrite())
    - setSagaID(iExagonContext.getSagaID())

    revert()
    Revert Changes to entity during SAGA
    Actual operation same as rollback

  • Method Details

    • create

      String create(ExagonEntity entity) throws RepositoryException
      Create EventEnvelope with createEntityEvent
      - creates UUID based on timestamp
      - creates CreateEntityEvent to store as event
      - setCreationDate(iExagonContext.getTsWrite())
      - setSagaID(iExagonContext.getSagaID())
      Returns:
      ID - return created ID.
      Throws:
      RepositoryException

    • save

      void save(ExagonEntityEvent event) throws RepositoryException
      Save EventEnvelope with event
      - checks if event as ID, if not creates UUID
      Parameters:
      event - - ExagonEntityEvent to save in EventEnvelope.
      Throws:
      RepositoryException
